I like reading mystery novels.
My son is a football player.
I am an american citizen.
I love pizza.

participant_2.background:
I like to cook with food i grow in my garden.
I like to travel.
My favorite music genre is classical.
I give lessons on string instruments.
I play many instruments.

content.text: I'm a huge fan of mystery novels. What are some of your favorite authors?
I love Agatha Christie and John Grisham. I also like some of the newer mystery writers like Karin Slaughter and Gillian Flynn.
I've read a few Agatha Christie novels and I really enjoyed them. I've also read some John Grisham, but I haven't read any of the newer mystery writers.
You should definitely check out Karin Slaughter and Gillian Flynn. They're both great writers.
I will, thanks for the recommendation!
My pleasure!
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to cook, especially with food I grow in my garden. I also love to travel and listen to classical music.
That sounds really nice. I love to cook too, but I don't have a garden. I also love to travel, but I haven't been anywhere in a while.
You should definitely come visit the U.K.! We have some beautiful gardens and there are so many different places to visit.
I would love to! I've always wanted to visit the U.K.
You should definitely do it! It's a beautiful country.
Thanks for the recommendation!
You're welcome!
So, what instruments do you play?
I play the piano, violin, and guitar. I also give lessons on string instruments.
Wow, that's really impressive! I can only play the guitar.
It's never too late to learn another instrument!
I know, but I'm not sure I have the time.
You could always try learning on the side. It's a lot of fun!
I might just do that!
You should! It's a great way to relax and de-stress.
I know, I know. I'll see what I can do.
Good luck!
